price: (104) The Fire will sear their faces, and they therein will have taut smiles.[968]
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ
footnotes: [968]- Their lips having been contracted by scorching until the teeth are exposed.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
